title: Maokai skin glitch
body:
just in case someone sees this currently, when ever I play Maokai his sapling (the one he holds in his hand for taunts and recall... etc) is invisible. {{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}  This happened to me in the most recent patch and after about 10 games in none of them was the sapling visible, and when playing with friends they say it's not visible for them either. But the sapling from the E ability is still visible so it's not game breaking or anything, just something i'd like to be fixed up.  {{champion:57}}
Edit: I haven't tried his default skin
